title: Garen is Broken To all HELL
body: Every time I've faced Garen top lane I lose horribly so I swap to draft pick just to ban him. He's even able to kill me under the tower.

replies.body: It could be a personal problem. Losing to a champion doesn't mean the champion is broken for the entirety of the game.
Unless it's Tryn, as that character is literal cancer.
Did you consider that maybe you have something to improve in your own play?
Garen is not broken or even really _good_. People just fail to respect his damage output and/or run away from him.

Garen is legit the worst champion in the game right now, assuming proper play.

If Garen's beating you, you're doing something wrong.
